item.description: Group theory is powerful in analysis problem with symmetry. This blog aims at giving an example on how Fourier Theorem could be derived on the ground of group theory.

item.title: Quantum Mechanical Historian
item.description: Along in the journey of studying quantum mechanics, we recognize the experimental weirdness of this field of study, poking its strangeness with different method of approaches. We throw away the ones that deviate from experiment leaving behind the one that hold true under test. One might stop and ponder how different approaches lead to the exact same result regardless of their different starting point and interpretation.
